mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.factory_code, f.name as factoryName, t.machine_code, d1.dict_value machineName, t.package_date, t.duty_code, d.dict_value AS dutyName, t.pot_num, t.package_weight, t.toll_weight, t.should_num, t.actual_num, t.balance_num, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM material_package t left join sys_factory f on f.code = t.factory_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d ON d.dict_code = t.duty_code AND d.dict_type = 'duty' LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d1 ON d1.dict_code = t.machine_code and d1.dict_type = 'machine_code' where t.id = #{id}
